txt.en:
'Before you go I wanted to make you an offer. What we have learned about the Dourhands unnerves me. I am concerned that if we do not move swiftly enough, the danger we face could multiply.

'We would be best served if you had a steed to call upon, and I am willing to offer one, if you wish.'

<rgb=#00FF00>NOTE: Accepting and completing this quest can only be done once on each server. If you logout before completing this quest, it will be removed from your quest log and you will need to accept it again. This will grant you access to a tutorial quest to introduce you to the LOTRO Store.</rgb>
'Very good. Let me get you started.'
A Little Extra Never Hurts -- Part 1

The LOTRO Store offers cosmetics, buffs, content access, and a variety of other goodies. Be sure to visit it often to see what's new!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Accepting and completing this quest can only be done once on each server. If you logout before completing this quest, it will be removed from your quest log and you will need to accept it again. This will grant you access to a special tutorial quest to introduce you to the LOTRO Store.</rgb>
Talk to Dwalin in Frerin's Court

Dwalin is in the courtyard of Frerin's Court in Ered Luin.

You should speak with Dwalin if you wish to hear his offer.

<rgb=#00FF00>This is a tutorial quest for accessing the web store.</rgb>
